mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_tgroub_table (contentid, contenttype, mapx, mapy, count) VALUE (#{contentid}, #{contenttype}, #{mapx}, #{mapy}, #{count}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE contentid = #{contentid}

insert into t_bookmark_table (TourMembercode, contentid) select (select TourMembercode from umemeber_table a, t_member_table b where a.mcode = b.mcode and a.mid = #{tourmembercode}), #{contentid} from dual where not exists (select * from t_bookmark_table where TourMembercode = (select TourMembercode from umemeber_table a, t_member_table b where a.mcode = b.mcode and a.mid = #{tourmembercode}) and contentid = #{contentid});

insert into t_good_table (TourMembercode, contentid) select (select TourMembercode from umemeber_table a, t_member_table b where a.mcode = b.mcode and a.mid = #{tourmembercode}), #{contentid} from dual where not exists (select * from t_good_table where TourMembercode = (select TourMembercode from umemeber_table a, t_member_table b where a.mcode = b.mcode and a.mid = #{tourmembercode}) and contentid = #{contentid});

insert into t_review_table (TourMembercode, contentid, tourtext, star) values ((select TourMembercode from umemeber_table a, t_member_table b where a.mcode = b.mcode and a.mid = #{tourmembercode}), #{contentid}, #{tourtext}, #{star})
insert into t_member_table (MCODE, TMname, TMgender, Tmage, TMphone) values ((select mcode from umemeber_table where mid = #{mid}), #{tmname}, #{tmgender}, #{tmage}, #{tmphone})
mapper.select: select c.Rcode, a.mid, c.tourtext, c.star, c.tourdate, c.contentid from umemeber_table a, t_member_table b, t_review_table c where a.mcode = b.mcode and b.TourMembercode = c.TourMembercode and contentid = #{contentid} ORDER BY Rcode DESC;

SELECT b.TourMembercode, b.MCODE, b.TMname, b.TMgender, b.TMage, b.TMphone FROM umemeber_table a, t_member_table b where (a.mcode = (select mcode from umemeber_table where mid = #{mid})) and (b.mcode = (select mcode from umemeber_table where mid = #{mid}))

select *, count(*) as num from t_bookmark_table where TourMembercode in (select mcode from t_member_table where mcode != (select mcode from umemeber_table where mid = #{mid}) and TMage between (SELECT truncate((select tmage from t_member_table where mcode = (select mcode from umemeber_table where mid = #{mid})), -1) FROM DUAL) and (SELECT truncate((select tmage from t_member_table where mcode = (select mcode from umemeber_table where mid = #{mid}))+10, -1) FROM DUAL)) GROUP BY contentid HAVING num>1;
select *, count(*) as num from t_bookmark_table GROUP BY contentid HAVING num>1;
mapper.delete: delete from t_bookmark_table where (select TourMembercode from umemeber_table a, t_member_table b where a.mcode = b.mcode and a.mid = #{tourmembercode}) and contentid = #{contentid}
delete from t_good_table where (select TourMembercode from umemeber_table a, t_member_table b where a.mcode = b.mcode and a.mid = #{tourmembercode}) and contentid = #{contentid}
